meanings.definition: The act of wearing a thong as underwear.
meanings.sent1: She felt comfortable in her thonging.
meanings.sent2: Thonging is common among many people.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his thonging made him feel like a superhero.
meanings.sent4: Her confidence soared as she embraced thonging.
meanings.sent5: The trend of thonging is growing in popularity.

meanings.definition: The process of securing something with a thong.
meanings.sent1: He completed the thonging of the package.
meanings.sent2: Thonging the rope tightly ensured safety.
meanings.sent3: The thonging of the tent was done expertly.
meanings.sent4: She watched the thonging of the boat with fascination.
meanings.sent5: The thonging held the pieces together securely.

meanings.definition: The practice of using a thong for decorative purposes.
meanings.sent1: The thonging on the purse added a stylish touch.
meanings.sent2: Thonging on sandals can enhance their look.
meanings.sent3: She admired the intricate thonging on the belt.
meanings.sent4: The thonging on the necklace sparkled in the light.
meanings.sent5: Thonging can elevate the design of clothing items.
